messages.subject: Re: Playful Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you , Pam for the tip for the book, Playful parenting .  I read the review out of the Seattle paper and really like, among other things, his idea to use
messages.messageBody:
Thank you , Pam for the tip for the book, 'Playful parenting'. I read
the review out of the Seattle paper and really like, among other things,
his idea to use instead of time outs (which I've never liked and have
never worked for us anyway)....calling a 'meeting on the couch' to
reconnect sounds like a much better solution.

I'm very much Em's playmate and confidante. I spend most days at teddy
bear tea parties, building tents on the furniture, going on nature
walks in the woods and taping our treasures to our 'tape' bracelets,
etc. : )

I was just telling my dh yesterday that it's interesting to me how much
younger I feel (47) lately, and I credit it all to hanging out with Em!

Hugs,
Denise
